description:
The first chapter in the FUTURE SAGA series depicts an unprecedented alteration of history!

This DLC is packed full of content that will allow you to enjoy DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 even more, including Extra Missions where characters in new forms are also active, new Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, Costumes, and more.

FUTURE SAGA Chapter 1 includes:
• 5 New Playable Characters: Vegeta (Super Saiyan God, Ultra Supervillain), Goku Black (Super Saiyan Rosé, Ultra Supervillain), Broly (Restrained), Android 18 (DB Super), Videl (DB Super)
• 3 Extra Missions
• 12 Parallel Quests
• 15 Additional Moves
• 3 Costumes/Accessories
• 5 Super Souls
• 63 Illustrations

*Some of the above content can be obtained by clearing certain conditions in the game.
name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - FUTURE SAGA Chapter 1
